scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,realtime,worker -c blue,green,yellow "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:realtime" "npm run dev:worker"
scripts.build: npm run prisma:generate && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:all
scripts.build:all: npm run build:web && npm run build:realtime && npm run build:worker
scripts.build:web: npm run prisma:generate && npm --prefix apps/web run build
scripts.build:realtime: npm run prisma:generate && npm --prefix apps/realtime run build
scripts.build:worker: npm run prisma:generate && npm --prefix apps/worker run build
scripts.test: npm run test:web && npm run test:realtime && npm run test:worker
scripts.lint: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:realtime && npm run lint:worker
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:web && npm run lint:fix:realtime && npm run lint:fix:worker
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:web && npm run typecheck:realtime && npm run typecheck:worker
